text:
FLEXPORT | SF, CA (HQ) | FULLTIME, ONSITE, VISA XFER OK | 30+ Openings | $130K - $180K + equity | www. flexport.com

Exciting times at Flexport!

Our mission is to make global trade easy for everyone. We are revolutionizing a huge industry that touches every country on the planet, which means solving complex challenges. We are looking for makers who love learning, are passionate about collaborating, and desire to see the global impact of the solutions they build.

==> We're on track to surpass FedEx and DHL this year. ==> We're a top 25 freight-forwarder on the largest trade lane in the world. ==> We've 2x our revenue year over year (2018 goal is $500M in revenue) ==> We are profitable!

We're looking for engineers to help us get to #1 (or get very close).

To learn more about our engineering culture, check us out at https://www.keyvalues.com/flexport

We have 30+ openings and hiring Software Engineers, preferably with 5+ years of experience or more.

We're language agnostic but here's our current tech stack: Frontend: React, Relay, Flow, Jest, Enzyme Mobile: React Native, Apollo Backend: Ruby on Rails, Postgres, GraphQL, Python, RSpec CI: GitHub, Buildkite Infrastructure: AWS, Python

APPLY TODAY: Software Engineer ==> https://grnh.se/e1d518251#app
